roleset.name: abase oneself

example.name: the one example
example.text: Frank grovels a little for the bookers, probably no more or less than he would have to if he worked for a big corporation.
example.arg: probably no more or less than he would have to if he worked for a big corporation.

roleset.note: GROVEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'grovel' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from grovel.01-v predicate notes)
